## Data Visualization

```{r plot_data}
# Use this R-Chunk to plot & visualize your data!

ggpplot <- ggplot(newdata,aes(x = lifeExp,
                   y = gdpPercap,
                   size = pop,
                   color = continent,
                   )) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Life Expectancy",
       y = "GDP per capita",
       title = "GDP Growth") +
  scale_y_continuous(trans = "sqrt") +
  theme_bw()
FinalPlot <- ggpplot +
  facet_grid(. ~ year)
ggsave("Casestudy2.png", FinalPlot, width = 15, units = "in")

```
